title: Propulsion Assignment
description: Analyze different propulsion systems and their applications in modern aerospace engineering. Include calculations and theoretical explanations.

title: Combustion Analysis
description: Study the combustion process in rocket engines, focusing on fuel efficiency, burn rates, and the chemical reactions involved.

title: Nozzle Design Project
description: Design a nozzle for a rocket engine, considering factors such as material selection, thermal stresses, and performance optimization.

title: Aerodynamics Quiz
description: Answer multiple-choice and short-answer questions on key aerodynamic principles, including lift, drag, and airflow characteristics.

title: Flow Analysis
description: Perform a detailed analysis of fluid flow over various airfoil shapes, using computational fluid dynamics (CFD) tools.

title: Heating Analysis
description: Investigate the thermal effects on aerospace structures during high-speed flight, including heat transfer and material response.

title: Structural Design Task
description: Design and analyze the structural components of an aerospace vehicle, focusing on stress distribution and material selection.

title: Orbital Calculations
description: Calculate the orbital parameters for a satellite, including launch requirements, orbital transfer maneuvers, and station-keeping strategies.

title: Systems Engineering Exam
description: Complete a comprehensive exam covering the principles of systems engineering, including requirements analysis, system design, and integration testing.
